commit.message:
Rollup merge of #94252 - lcnr:def_kind-encoding, r=cjgillot

don't special case `DefKind::Ctor` in encoding

considering that we still use `DefKind::Ctor` for these in `Res`, this seems weird and definitely felt like a bug when encountering it while working on #89862.

r? `@cjgillot`

verification.payload:
tree 3009b4d86dca9cbdcc7676ad51fe4d9ecc305cd1
parent 7dcbe6924e1c61cbd7a209eb32332d3b278d6951
parent ae45e8a638402a7fbd5901c476aa2e21a8d21658
author Matthias Krüger <matthias.krueger@famsik.de> 1645794877 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1645794877 +0100

Rollup merge of #94252 - lcnr:def_kind-encoding, r=cjgillot

don't special case `DefKind::Ctor` in encoding

considering that we still use `DefKind::Ctor` for these in `Res`, this seems weird and definitely felt like a bug when encountering it while working on #89862.

r? `@cjgillot`
